[VZ_WIFI7[WPS][WEBUI] Cannot connect to device using WPS self PIN method
WPS Push-Button and PIN usage models must be supported, and such functions must be enabled or configured by default in the firmware release

status.description: SW with updated config was released
status.name: INTEGRATED

fields.Action: Access the Web-UI and generate an 8-digits PIN code in the "Access Point Method" section with reference to the WiFi 5Ghz private network (the 2 private and the 2 guest networks should be there)
fields.Expected Result: The PIN is generated and printed out in the Web-UI

fields.Action:
Provide the PIN to the client and start the pairing process

	Note: use JumpStart to use the AP PIN on the client side
fields.Expected Result: The Wifi Client is connected to the Wifi 5GHz SSID

fields.Action: Perform internet browsing on the client
fields.Expected Result: Internet browsing is successful on the client

fields.description:
The WPS Self PIN method must be available and working

[Precondition]

1xWiFi 5GHz WPS capable station available, with Jumpstart installed

WiFi 2.4GHz disabled on the DUT
fields.summary: [WI-FI-WPS] WPS Methods - Self PIN (5GHz Band)
